messages: Welcome to the Smylos world. In here, people’s wealth is measured by the dimension of their smile. There are two main classes: smiling people, who live in the city, according to their social status, and non-smiling people, who live in the slums. The smile is only a measurement of wealth and does not resemble joy and happiness as in the out world.
Ok

During the journey, you are given the option to listen to conversations and talk to different characters by going through the map with your phone. Be aware that it would be possible to experience them only once. When you have listened or read a part of the story, it will disappear for good as the life in Smylos continues. Listen carefully and read thoroughly to know where to go next and what to search for.
Ok
Just one more hint, the map is tagged with gold in some important places you cannot miss!
To start with the game, we suggest moving your phone to the gold in the slums to hear what is happening there.
Ok, I will have a look in the slums...
We found you a job as the apprentice of a man called Epeo. Go and visit his store located on top of the river after having visited the Slums, Good luck!
Mmm, interesting...
You entered the Epeo's store and hear the following conversation...

Hello there! I guess you are my new assistant.  It was bloody on time that someone accepted my job offer. I have been searching for an assistant for a long time now. Welcome to my store! I’m Epeo, some call me the gatekeeper of the city.
Nice to meet you! It’s my first time here. Everything in this world is new to me.

That is understandable! I will give you some guidelines. First of all, you need a smile to be accepted in the wealthy part of the city. I am the only one who can provide you with a fake smile, if you aren’t wealthy. That is confidential, by the way. Are you ready to start working?
Yes
No
Good
I have an important mission for you. It’s a matter of saving this world.
Well, you have to be. You are working for me now.
I have an important mission for you. It’s a matter of saving this world.
What is this mission about?
Your aim is to find a potion. Not a lot of people know about it, so tread carefully. You do not want this info to get in the wrong hands, it could turn out catastrophic.
But how can I orient myself in the city?

First of all, you need to talk to people and gather information. The people you meet will hopefully help you out and introduce you to other people. It is also crucial that you go around and listen to them in the city. It is a lot of information to be found in eavesdropping on others. Remember, though, that my potion does not last forever, so choose wisely who you would like to talk to.
Ok. And where do I go first?

Start off by talking to Golin, he also just entered the city, maybe you can reach him at the well. He might be able to help you out. Afterwards, go and find a man called Sisyphus, he knows a lot of people, and can give you valuable information.
Now drink my potion, so you can talk to people in the smiling city, and get to work.
Wait, what? Are there two different potions?
Yes. The potion you get from me is pretty weak and it only lasts for a short time. The potion I want you to find is much much stronger!
Ok, got it.
Glu glu glu...
Hello there! You look like a friendly face! It’s my first time in this part of the city, I feel a bit uncomfortable. Sorry, I forgot to introduce myself, I’m Golin. What are you doing here?
Nice to meet you, Golin! I just arrived here as well. I got a job at Epeo’s store.
Wow, not bad! What are you going to do?
He wants me to find some sort of special potion for him. I have no idea what it is, but it sounds important.
What are you doing here?
Well, I don’t really know. Trying to “find myself”, I guess. I have been living in the slums my entire life, following Cynics way of living.
Ehm, Cynics?
I see, so...

Oh sorry, I always forget that they are not as common as I think they are. And why would they? Their lifestyle is quite, how can I put it, simple. They essentially live on the bare basics of life and are free of all possessions. They do not care about fame, wealth or power.

Kyril, the man who raised me, follows this philosophy. He’s like a father to me. Together with Hypatia, he took care of me, when he found me alone in the streets. You should pay Kyril a visit, he’s always in the slums. He can tell you a better version of the story and he knows a lot about the city, so might be helpful for your work. I would go to him before entering the city. But yes, the reason why I’m here is basically to find my biological father, who left me and my mother when I was a kid, and now he’s apparently living here, in the smiling part of the city.
Wow, what a story. I will definitely pay Kyril a visit. Do you, by any chance, know a man called Sisyphus? Epeo told me to seek out this man, but I have no idea where I can find him.
Sisyphus! That’s the man I am looking for as well. He works at the tax office, located at the bottom of the big tower in the centre of the city.
Thank you! I need to get going. Good luck on your journey!
No problem! Good luck to yourself!
Ok, see you Golin!
So you should be Kyril, right?
Yes. How do you know me?
I’ve met Golin, who told me kind things about you.
Oh, he’s such a nice boy! I love him as he was my son.
Why did he leave you

He decided to leave the slums to experience a different way of living. I can’t really blame him. I also lived in the smiling world a couple of years ago, but I turned it all down to follow the Cynic way of living. I strongly believe in a life free from all possessions, wealth and power. However, I also believe in freedom of thought, everyone should be free to choose what is best for his own life, that’s why I let Golin go.
Sounds like a good decision.
Sounds like a bad decision.
Well, the decision is taken. Only the future will determine if it is good or bad.
Anyway, how can I help you?

titles: Tell about your mission from Epeo
messages: I am trying to find a potion that supposedly is very important. I have no idea where to find it, but I need to talk to people. So I was wondering if you knew anyone there that could help me?
I am new to this world, and want to make some new friends. I therefore wondered if you could introduce me to some people?

Ok, I understand. Unfortunately, when I left the smiling world, I also stopped having contact with my friends from that part of the city. But even if we don’t have contact anymore, I still try to stay updated on what they are doing in their life.

titles: Ask for information about his contacts
messages: Is it anyone that it would be important for me to know about?
Ok, thanks anyways. Bye!

As I said, I don’t have any contact with anyone anymore. Big Smile is aman you should know about. He’s the dictator of Smylos and the creator of this society filled with envy and hate. As a poor man, you are invisible. His ideology is that you should work hard to deserve a place in this society. He has the biggest smile of all, and is the ideal everyone is thriving to be. Be careful around him.
Goodbye and good luck! I’m always here if you need help.
Bye bye.
Next!
Are you Sisyphus?
Yes, I am. How can I help you?
Great! I am working for a man called Epeo. He told me to find you. I am looking for a potion, that is supposed to be really important. Do you know anything about that?

Ohh Epeo, I know him for years! We know each other very well, but… I’m not always sure to know him fully. He doesn’t seem transparent to me. I heard some rumours… someone says Plousios was his real name, that he changed his identity a lot of years ago, before I even met him.
Why should he have done such a thing?!
Why should he have done such a thing?!
They say he killed a man… But who knows, we don’t know who to trust anymore in this city! Anyway, what did you need help with, again?
Oh no, I didn’t mean that! He’s always ready to help people… well, he doesn’t give anything for nothing, but who really does it in this world?! By the way, what did you need help with, again?
I am looking for a potion, a seemingly important one. Do you know anything about it?

Mmm, a potion, a potion that is so important that Epeo would hire a person to find it… Let me think about it. I have heard rumours about someone who wants to alter society by manipulating the smiles. But to me, this sounds impossible. However, let me talk to some people and see if I can find some valuable information! Come back in a couple of days and I might have something for you.

titles: Ask him why he is so helpful
messages: Thank you, bye!
Thanks! May I ask you why you are so helpful?
Bye! Don’t let this awful city affect your pure soul!

Haha, I know people here are not very helpful. This world is a terrible place. I am trying to make it a little bit better. But I guess it is hopeless. All the people who approach me are usually complaining, so it’s nice to see a fresh and uncontaminated face. Anyway, nice to meet you!
Bye bye...

audios.audio_title: Listen to Johan and his wife

messages: Look who’s back again! I bet you’ve run out of the temporary potion, haven’t you?
Ehm… yes. Is it possible to have some more?

Sure! You work for me, don’t forget it! Until you will have accomplished your mission I will provide you with what you need. By the way, how was your first time in the smiling world? Have you discovered something interesting there?
Well, to be honest, during my quest I heard some rumours about you. They told me that Epeo is not your real name, that you changed your identity.
Hmm… I managed to talk to Kyril, a man from the slums. He previously lived in the city and decided to leave everything he owned in order to follow the Cynic way of life.

Haha, nice one! How could they tell such a tall tale?! I’m always glad to confirm that smiling people can’t do without discrediting other people, it’s their favourite hobby! However, who the hell told you this bullshit?
Sisyphus, the man you suggested to visit last time!
Oh, it was just a rumour I heard while wandering around the city. I can’t really say who exactly affirmed that.
Ah, now it’s clear! You shouldn’t trust him, in this most recent period is going slightly mad… I think it’s because of his son.
What happened with his son?
Ohh, come on, these are private affairs! You’d better use your curiosity to inquire more about the ultimate potion.
Yes, of course!
Well, you should have talked to someone during all this time!

Sure! I met Sisyphus who told me that he actually heard about a certain potion which could alter society. He will investigate more and report his discoveries if I’ll come back to him in a couple of days.
Is it all that?
Hmm… I managed to talk to Kyril, a man from the slums. He previously lived in the city and decided to leave everything he owned in order to follow the Cynic way of life.
It seems a senseless choice to me, but never mind, go on!

Kyril told me that, when he was a smiling one, he had a friend whose name is Johan. He said I should talk to him as he has always worked in the field of chemistry, moreover, he had some business about potion-making. Maybe can be useful, but he couldn’t guide me to him as he lost contacts with smiling people when he left the city.
Mmm Johan… sounds new! Well, I guess it won’t be easy to find him, but it’s a good starting point in the search for the ultimate potion.
May I ask you what this potion does? It’s really difficult to investigate something which is still obscure to me.

Oh, it’s really powerful, it can permanently modify people’s smiles. Well, time is precious! Here’s your temporary potion again. Just to advise you, Golin has just moved to his father’s house, the Palace, you’ll find him there! Have a productive journey in the city! Goodbye!
Thank you, bye!
Glu glu glu...
What are you doing here?
Uhm… I don’t know many people in this city, and Epeo told me you moved here. How did you acquire that big smile?
It’s a long story… I found my father eventually.

titles: Be emotional and ask how it was
Be careless and ask if he can help you
messages: I bet that must have been special for yol. How did it go?
I am glad that you found him! I am still trying to find the right people to talk to. And I still don’t really know what I am actually looking for. Any suggestions?

Well… he was really sick, he died a couple of days after we met. He was filled with remorse about not meeting me before and helping my mother out. I was apparently the only child he had, so he wanted me to inherit his fortune. So, here I am in this big fancy house, could almost call it a palace. I even have a permanent smile now, but have no idea what I should do.
Oh, I am really sad to hear that. My condolences
Well at least you got a huge smile, and a big house!
Thanks
That is not really the first thing I think about now though...
What are you planning to do now then?

I don’t really know what to do. I was hoping to find answers, but this just made everything worse. I guess I will just live here for a while, see how it is. Maybe if I try this lifestyle I might realise Kyril's choice more.
How is your quest going?
Not that great to be honest. I am still trying to find the right people to talk to. Any suggestions?

Hmm, to be honest, my network is not that much to brag about. Kyril is wise and knows a lot, so you could always go to him again. Sisyphus is a bit crazy, but knows a lot of people. I would go and talk to them if I were you.
Ok, thank you. See you around!
You are back in the slums. What brings you here?
Hi Kyril! I wanted to talk to you.
Have you heard about Big Smile’s new restrictions?
Yes... I heard...
No, please tell me!

It seems that Big Smile has acquired information about people obtaining fake smiles to enter the city. He has therefore spread his guards through Smylos in order to verify smiles authenticity, as well as doing random raids in houses and shops.
So tread carefully.
I’ll do my best in order not to be discovered, thank you!
How is your journey in the smiling world going?
I am still working on finding the potion. I try to talk to people, and listen around to find some clues. I am making progress, but I still have some work let.
I am still going around talking to people and gathering information. I still have some work to do though.
What type of potion are actually talking about?

titles: Tell about the importance of the potion
messages: I am not really sure. The only thing I know is that it is very important to Epeo, and since he already is in the business of modifying smiles, I would assume that it has something to do with that.
No one has ever told me what this potion actually does. I just know it is important.

Yes, that makes sense. A potion that modifies smiles. I knew a man called Johan, we were good friends when I lived in the smiling city. He always talked about making a potion that could permanently give you a big smile. But after his partners betrayed him, I don’t think he does that stuff anymore. He might still be a man you should talk to. Unluckily I don’t know where he lives now, so you just have to search for him.
Ok, then I can’t really help you out.
I see. Don’t let me waste your time then! Bye!
Ok, thanks for your help Kyril ! Good bye.
Hey Sisyphus, remember me? We talked some time ago about an important potion I’m seeking on Epeo’s behalf.
Ah you again, how did it go? Did you find it? Ah, you probably didn't, I know some people you can look for, but I don't know how willing they are to help you...
No, I didn't, but I managed to talk to someone. Who are you thinking of? Please, tell me where I can find them.

Well, I have a new colleague here in the big tower, uhum damn woman… She knows a lot about the city too. I mean, I know a lot of people, but I don't really talk to them, they just show me their wealth… You should try and work here for one day, it’s exhausting, tiring… I wish I were free. These people are trapped, obsessed...
Sounds like you have a bad day. Is there a lot of work to do?
Oh, don't worry, it will be alright. I would like to talk to this woman, where can I find her?

Yes, it is terrible, have you heard about the new rules of Big Smile? They are killing me. There is so much to do… And what sense do they make? Selfish bastard, he just wants to stay rich. They all do, it's a terrible city this. You can lose your loved one because of such venality.

titles: Ask him for the woman’s name
messages: Ehm, Sisyphus, could you tell me the name of the woman? Where can I find her?
What do you mean? Who did you lose?
Ah yes, her name is Koralia. You can find her in the Executive Office. I will schedule an appointment to meet her.

Well, it has been a long time ago. I was a creative man, I travelled a lot, writing stories. Just me and my wife, we were free. Then we got a son, so I decided to settle and get a reliable job at this office. You see, you cannot raise a child in uncertainty. I’ve been working here since then, an awful job, but I did it for him. After my wife died, it became even worse. One day, he left… My son, he just walked out of the door and told me he was going to pursue a good career! How could he?! I sacrificed everything and he left me for that... Well, you are a nice person. Try not to make the same mistake. Go to Koralia, but protect yourself, she is a very greedy woman. A nice face but a destructive temper. Go upstairs, you will find her in the Executive Office.

Well, I'm not sure you would actually, what a person! She walks in here all the time thinking she is the bloody queen, demanding me everything she can ask for. But I don't care. I have my own life, my own quest. I see what they want, you know. They think they got me, but I am a free man, I think outside the rules. I’m not affected by this toxic obsession. But, how could I lose him...

But wait, maybe there is another person who can help you. Her name is Hypatia, she passed here last week asking for a private meeting with Big Smile, maybe it’s something related with the potion. I don’t know where she could be now, but I suggest you trying in the market because there is more probability to find people there.
Thank you Sisyphus, this has been very helpful.
Take care, you are a good person. I wish you the best and hope you will come back sometime. It is nice talking to you, you remind me of the past.
I hope your days will be better soon. Goodbye!
Hi! Are you Hypatia?
Yes, that’s me. Do I know you?
No, you don’t. I am new to the city. I am working for Epeo. He sent me on a mission, and I have the notion that you might help me.

Oh, not sure how helpful I can be. I was on a mission myself, trying to look for my son. Well, he is not really my son, but I raised him since he was 10. He went on a journey to find himself. His name is Golin.
I met Golin! He also got a smile through Epeo. But did you find him?
Yes I did, just now actually. He inherited the wealth from his father on his deathbed. But I don't know if he is doing well actually. He seemed different from who he used to be.
What has changed? He sure got a lot of money, he told me he decided to find out how it is to live with a wealthy smile.
Yes I agree he was acting a bit strange.
He suddenly seemed like everyone else in this city. As if he lost his purity. Well I don't know, it is a strange city, the people are rude.
Oh, ok. Then I need to keep looking for him. Bye!

I am trying to find a potion. I don’t know who has it, but I think it is someone with power. I talked to a guy called Sisyphus at the Government building. He said that you might have some information.

First of all, pay attention while you’re in the city. People living here are always thirsty for acquiring the biggest smile possible. I had a hard life: I was raised by some relatives in the slums, as my parents died. When I got the opportunity to pay their help back and raise Golin, it meant a lot to me. Now I want to find Golin, only to be sure he’s safe and sound. This world is awful, you never know. I would love to destroy the whole system, its senseless hierarchy based on smiles. Be careful, don’t believe anything you hear or people tell you. Good luck on your journey!
Ok, thank you, bye!
Hello. I am looking for Koralia, am I at the right place?
Do you have an appointment?

titles: Tell her you already have one
messages: Yes, Sisyphus booked a time for me
No, I did not know that was necessary.
Sisyphus, I know him. Can’t find any booking in the system, but since I know Sisyphus I will let it pass for this time.
What do you think? This is the Executive Office, you can’t just walk in here as it was your local post office. I am sorry, I am having a bad day. Let me check if she is available at the moment.
Ok, she has a couple of minutes. But next time book an appointment!
I will lead you to Koralia’s office. Oh, here she is!
The receptionist introduces you to Koralia
Hello, what can I help you with? And please be quick, my schedule is really tight.

titles: Tell her directly about your mission
messages: Hi, thank you for taking the time. I work for a guy named Epeo, he has sent me on a mission to find a certain potion. It is supposedly very important. I have been talking to a lot of people and have now ended up here with you. Do you know about this, or know anyone that might know?
Hi, thank you for taking the time. I heard the rumour that something is happening in the city that could threaten Big Smile’s power.
A potion?! Uggh, ehm...
Oh, are you ok? You look like you are not feeling well.
Yes, I’m ok!
I have not heard of such a thing. Big Smile is my boss, he is the person you need to talk to.
Threaten Big Smile’s power? Uggh, ehm… Impossible, what kind of thing?
Oh, are you ok? You look like you are not feeling well. I cannot tell you, I must talk directly with your superior.
Yes, I’m ok! Sure, it seems an important thing.
Let me book you an appointment with him. Come back next week! I have to go to a meeting now. My secretary will show you the way out. Bye.
Oh, ok. Bye then. Thank you for taking the time.
Hi Epeo! It’s me again!
Have you found the potion?
Not yet, but maybe I have some interesting clues which bring me closer to the final resolution!
I told you it is very important, this potion can damage society as we know it. Do you want to be responsible for that? Now tell me, what is your answer?
No, I will do my best, I am going around trying to get the right information, but no one really helps me.
No, really I don't, I will go and continue my work. I'm really trying to find the potion.

Why are you trying, we need results! Do you realise how much potion you already used? Do you realise how much I gave to you? Ohh... You owe me a lot. So stop waiting for my smiles and bring me what makes me happy!
Thank you Epeo, I will do as you wish
Thank you Epeo, but what if I fail, I mean it is very difficult to find, the people in the city are sending me in circles.

Well, let me tell you this: If you don't find that potion and bring it to me, I'll have something else for you to do. But don't think it will be this social or free. There is nowhere to go, you are in great debt to me. So get out of here!
Glu glu glu...
Hey, can I come in?
Oh, hey, it’s you again. No, it is too messy inside. We can talk here. What do you want?
I am still working on the mission I got from Epeo. I have talked to a lot of people, but I still haven’t found the potion.
So how is your mission finding yourself going? Seems that are living a completely different lifestyle.
I met Hypata the other day, she asked for you.

My mission? Ohh, well I don’t know really. I have a pretty chill life. I party, drink, eat, have sex. I can’t complain, can I? I got a lot of friends, at least a lot of people showing up for my parties... And I got a really nice chariot. Not as good as my neighbour though. That piece of shit thinks he has that amazing smile, showing off with his Egyptian obelisk in his garden…
You sound a bit jealous...
I think your chariot looks amazing!
Fuck you! I'm not jealous. I just... don't like people showing off.
Yeah, you are right. It is a masterpiece.
But I can’t really say I found myself yet, no. I just need to live my life to the fullest, and one day I will find my revelation.

Oh yes, she came by. I don’t know how she found me. She was really upset when I left her and Kyril. But it’s fine now, after she heard the story about my dad and that I had a wealthy life here, she accepted it. It also seemed that she had something else on her mind. She was quite concerned about this world, talked about how awful it was, and how she wanted to destroy it.
With all these parties, I guess you have quite a big network now? Do you know Big Smile by any chance?
Big Smile, the ruthless dictator of this city? I know him. I cannot say we are friends, but I know him.

titles: Ask him how he knows him.
Ask if he can arrange a meeting.
messages: How do you actually know the most important man in the city?
I would really like to meet him. Can you help me out?
I don’t really know if I should tell you.
Ok, I don’t believe you then. You are probably just bragging about that you know him. If you actually know him you should be able to prove it.
Okay, whatever.
Ok, so you don’t think I have contacts?! I am one of the most influential people around here. Look at my smile! It’s perfect. Ok, I will tell you. I deliver packages to him.
So you are a postman?
You can call it that, yes.
I would really like to meet him. Can you help me out?

Wow, you are really a pain in the ass today. I am tired ok!? I had a huuge party yesterday, and I have a huuuge hangover! But ok, if it will make you leave me alone, I will help you out one last time. Wait here. Golin goes back in the house and comes back with a small ziplock bag in his hand. Here, take this to his office. I will let you know that you are bringing his merch. You acquired a mysterious bag

titles: Ask what is in the bag
messages: What is in the bag exactly?
Bye!
For christ sake, that is none of your business. Just leave!
Bye!
Hey Sisyphus, I am back, how are you?
Hey, I am good, how are you? Did you speak to Koralia and Hypatia? How did it go?
It went alright, Koralia was a bit abrupt. Hypatia talked to me about the city. But none of them could bring me to Johan.
And this potion you were talking about, did you get any closer to that? It is as if the whole city is going crazy at the moment. I think it is important that these secrets are getting exposed.
No, it is difficult, no one seems to have it. I keep going around the city talking to people but I don't get any closer.
What does this potion actually mean to you, why is it so important?
Well, I guess I can trust you Sisyphus, you have been helping me along the way.

titles: Talk about what the potion does
messages: Epeo has this business with potions, and he is pushing me to get this potion. I have no more time, he says this potion could be dangerous for society.
I have been told that the potion is destroying the world. It could take down everything that exists in this city.

I see, so it is related to his business. Yes, I know Epeo, and you don't know what it does exactly? Maybe I have another idea. Have a talk with Johan. Perhaps you’ll find him in the market. I hope he can help you a bit. Let me know how things are going, ok? I look forward to seeing you back here, it is a revelation to talk to you in this terrible environment.

I see, so it could take this system down you say? Interesting… It is important that you get it, I guess. Maybe I have another idea. Have a talk with Johan. Perhaps you’ll find him in the market. I hope he can help you a bit. Let me know how things are going, ok? I look forward to seeing you back here, it is a revelation to talk to you in this terrible environment.
Thank you again Sisyphus, I will go have a look in the city to find Johan. See you soon and good luck with the work.
Hello, I think I have an appointment with Big Smile.
No?! This is not a… Oh, it’s you! Sorry, I didn't recognise you, yes. Miss Koralia wanted to see you before you meet Big Smile. Let me call her.
Koralia enters the room
Hello, you wanted to see me?

Hi! Yes, I do. Just wanted to give you some background info before meeting Big Smile. There are a lot of rumours that float around, but no one really knows him very well. First of all, don’t be afraid of meeting him. Actually, he’s a really approachable person, way different from what people normally say about him. They don’t even know him in person, so, as usual, people need to talk rubbish just for the pleasure of doing it.
Why are you telling me this?

I just think he deserves to be viewed by who he actually is, not just by rumours. I once had a brother, his name was Plousios. He died some years ago, but I can’t stop questioning what I have been told about his death. Nobody has ever found his dead body.
Yes, I understand but...

I had a private meeting with Big Smile. I’ve always thought that he was a strong leader, but without heart. However, I found out that he has a story too. He lost his brother, just like I did. You might think that we only think about our work, but we are people too, you know. We like to go sailing at the weekends, go out for dinner, have a good time with friends. I have a wonderful time during the holidays at my house looking over the sea. On the other hand, we work hard, that is why we are here in society. We make the city work.

titles: Ask what she wants to say
messages: What are you trying to say?
Sorry, but I have another meeting right now, let me quickly tell them I will come a bit later since our conversation is more important.

titles: You have more things to do.
messages: Yes, sure, I will be right here.
Ok, don't worry, I have plenty of things to do, we can talk another time.
I will only be gone for a couple of minutes, I’ll be back soon!
I will only be gone for a couple of minutes, you should wait!
You are now alone in Koralia's office.
Wait, it won’t take so much time.
Start to look around in the office to find out more
Under a huge pile of papers, right on Miss Koralia’s desk, you find an interesting document. You read it hastily in your mind, worried to be discovered.

After the court decision, taking into account the legal deeds, Mr Plousios is sentenced to give his actual status to the only survivor of the victim’s family. Henceforth, he is forbidden to ever recover his previous social condition as the court recognizes Mr Plousios as the only responsible for Mr Nekrós’ death.
Koralia is returning. Anxiously you hide the document under the pile of papers as you found them.
Sorry, daily bureaucracy. Here I am. What was I saying?
You were telling me about your and Big Smile’s past. Anyway, I found it really difficult to follow you.

Yes, I wanted to tell you about Big Smile so you will not judge him from what you heard. Give him a chance the way he is. But time flies. I really need to go to that meeting now. Business can’t wait, you know… I think now you are ready to talk with Big Smile. Goodbye.
Thanks for the time! Goodbye.
Are you Johan?
Yes, that is me, what do you want?

titles: you are happy you found him
messages: Hi, I’m just glad I found you… I have heard a lot about you.
I have heard a lot about you too. You are the one who is spreading the news about the potion.

It was not my intention, in fact, I am working for Epeo and he gave me the difficult task to find a potion for him. It is really hard, indeed I continue to talk with a lot of people and nobody has an accurate hint of where I can find it, maybe you can help me.
It was not my intention, I continue to talk with a lot of people and nobody has an accurate hint of where I can find it. I have been told that you may know something about it, don’t you?
Ah, Epeo wants to find this potion as well. So what did he tell you this potion does?
Oh yes?! Why should I know something? And what have you been told about this potion?
Epeo told me that this potion may destroy the world.

Why would it do that! I mean, it does make someone very very powerful, but is that different from the current situation with Big Smile? As far as I have heard, everyone is after the potion now. Thanks to your gossip. But the potion is not what you think it is.
What do you mean? How do you know?

Because I am the one who made the potion! Since the beginning, the potion brought me nothing but disgrace. The first time I worked on it, I created a potion that was not as valuable and desired as it is now. The outcome of the first potion was an increased smile but with a temporary result, it only lasted for a limited amount of time.
This is funny, Epeo uses a similar potion to run his business.
What had happened next?

Oh, well, I see. I did not know who had my potion. The thing is that my partners thought that this potion was useless and that we were wasting our time. They betrayed me and sold the potion to a man, so this man may be Epeo. It all starts to make sense. After that, there was nothing left. My smile started to decrease and my perfect life to decline. Now I know it was Epeo’s fault. I lost my dignity and the love of my life because of this. I lost everything, due to my partners.

My partners thought that this potion was useless and that we were wasting our time. I knew I could do better so I continue to try to perfect it but I was betrayed by them and the potion was sold to a man. There was nothing left. My smile started to decrease and my perfect life to decline. I lost my dignity and the love of my life. I lost everything, due to my partners.
I understand, but what about the final potion?

I have perfected the potion and I have created one that gives you a permanent smile, not bad uh? I worked hard to achieve this, I just want to get my previous wealth back. But these potions are cursed. If you want to have it, you are too late. Someone came to my lab and stole it right under my nose.
So you are telling me that you don’t have the potion anymore.
That’s exactly what I’m saying. That bastard! He entered my house. And he probably knew about the potion because of all your chatter!
Oh, I’m sorry to hear this, it seems that this potion is running away from me. Do you know who stole it from you?
I really don’t know him. He looked a little bit confused, I could see the craziness in his eyes. But I’m going to fix this, I’m going to get my potion again. I’m sure I am.
Nice to meet you, see you! If I get to know something I’ll tell you. Bye!
May I come in?
Who are you?
Good morning sir, last week I came here to the big tower and I talked with your colleague Koralia, who booked me an appointment to talk with you.
First of all, Koralia is not my colleague. She works for me.
That said, what brings you here?
Ehm… I was sent to the city in order to accomplish a mission.
Ehm… I heard there is something which threatens your power
Sent to the city?! So you do not come from the city, I infer… And exactly, of what kind of mission are you talking about? Who sent you here?

No, I meant that I was sent to the city centre, in the business district, to conduct my investigation. It is about… a potion. I understood it is really dangerous if it ends in the wrong hands, so I’m here to warn you and to ask if you know anything about that. Who could have it?
Another time that bloody potion?! Who could have it?! Damn, YOU should tell me that! Why are you here then, if you don’t have any useful information?! Have you read news agency on this door plaque?!
Surely not, I thought I could discover more here, simply because you are the supreme leader, so I imagine you have your own privileged channels of communication.
Are you trying to face me?! Obviously I have my own emissaries, but do you really think I am going to tell confidential information to the first person who comes here?!

They always try to undermine society, nothing new. But the absurd is that they do not even realize that they are going against themselves in this way. They ignore how much effort it takes to maintain the order. It would be surely easier for me to let people drown in their own freedom, but I am not such a selfish leader.

titles: Ask how he manages to govern
messages: I see… How do you manage all that?
I see your point. It has to be difficult to govern an entire city, we can’t even imagine that.

Surely it requires a strong temper and determination… But you know, fortunately, there’s this amazing white lady, who is always by my side and helps me! I suppose you’re the one who visited Golin… you should have something for me, shouldn’t you?
Oh yes, I forgot about it. Here you are
We all need a shelter sometimes, where feeling safe. You definitely need it, especially if you have experienced abandon and your loved ones have passed away…

One day a man killed my brother, the only loved person I had, as our parents died when we were just kids. As a punishment for the murder, the court gave me the killer’s wealth. I didn’t even choose my condition. They forced me to carry this huge fortune, which brings with it a huge burden.

So, what I had to do?! I worked hard in order to be not just one of the wealthiest men, but the biggest smile ever! I wanted to have my revenge from this cruel life. What should a person pursue when he has lost everyone and everything in life?!
Oh, I’m terribly sorry about that, I didn’t know it.

I see your point. It has to be difficult to govern an entire city, we can’t even imagine that. However, I really have to leave you, I need to speed up my quest. It has been a pleasure to meet you. Goodbye!
Why should you? They only tell bad things about me, without even know my story. Anyway, work calls. Our conversation should end here. Goodbye!
I have not so much time too. Goodbye!
Goodbye! It has been a pleasure to meet you.
Epeo I am back, I found a man called Johan who made the potion but it got stolen right before I spoke to him.

Yes, I heard about it. There is a lot happening at the moment. The city is in danger. We need to go to the well now! People are gathering there. I don't know if we will still be on time to settle things right.
I am ready Epeo, lets go
Sounds at the well
What are you doing here?
Me?
Do you think we should throw it in the well, or should I give it to you?
Give it to me
Throw it in the well
The game is finished, you created equality for the complete city. Everyone has a smile. You are a communist
Now hand me the potion! Don't you value being loyal to your boss?
Yes
No
Do you think it is right to cheat your way through life, defy society's rules for your own personal gain?
Yes
No
Finish listening to the audio
I give it to you Epeo
I give it to you Johan
I give it to you Big Smile
I give it to you Sisyphus
The game is finished, you gave the potion back to Epeo. You value loyalty
The game is finished, you gave the potion to Johan. He regained his wealth. He was the original inventor.

The game is finished, you gave the potion to Big Smile. He is became the most powerful man in the world. You don't care about equality rules are important. Have you considered moving to China or Russia?
The game is finished, you created equality for the complete city. Everyone has a smile
